original_text: The entire assembly of Judah rejoiced, along with the priests and Levites and all who had assembled from Israel, including the foreigners who had come from Israel and also those who resided in Judah.
korean_text: 유다 온 회중과 제사장들과 레위 사람들과 이스라엘에서 온 모든 회중과 이스라엘 땅에서 나온 나그네들과 유다에 사는 나그네들이 다 즐거워하였으므로

sentences.original_text: The entire assembly of Judah rejoiced
along with the priests and Levites
and all who had assembled from Israel
including the foreigners who had come from Israel
and also those who resided in Judah
